title: InformationEntity
description: Named information asset subject to fine-grained access rights and data classification. Represents a logical grouping of data (e.g., customer PII, financial records) whose access is governed by associated InformationRight grants and AccountabilityRequirements, per NIST SP 800-53 AC-3 and IP-1.

classification.description: Sensitivity classification of this information asset. Use classificationLevel values: public, internal, confidential, restricted, or top-secret.

authorizationRequirements.description: References InformationRight nodes defining which actors may access this entity and under what constraints.
